requestParams.name: card_update
requestParams.desc: 编辑会员卡所需的会员卡信息

children.name: activate_mode
children.desc: 激活方式，0:不需要激活；1:仅需手机激活；2:手机+填写资料

children.name: card_alias
children.desc: 商家会员卡的唯一标识

children.name: description
children.desc: 使用须知最大字符：250

children.name: amount_limit
children.desc: 累积消费金额(金额单位为分)

children.name: points_limit
children.desc: 累积积分

children.name: trade_limit
children.desc: 累积下单成功次数

children.name: is_allow_share
children.desc: 是否允许微信端分享 ，默认允许

children.name: level
children.desc: 若微商城店铺已升级至新会员等级体系，此字段将不在支持，无需传入。 未升级至等级体系的店铺仍可使用该字段，当 card_type 为2时必填

children.name: name
children.desc: 会员卡名，卡名不允许重复，最大字符：9

children.name: coupon_id
children.desc: 优惠券ID

children.name: name
children.desc: 优惠券名称

children.name: number
children.desc: 优惠券数量

children.name: discount
children.desc: 折扣权益字段，折数 ，1表示0.01折范围选择：1-100（type为2时必传）

children.name: is_available
children.desc: 是否可用，必须为true

children.name: points
children.desc: 积分权益字段，积分数量（type为4时必传）

children.name: type
children.desc: 权益类型，1:包邮；2:折扣；3:送现金券；4：送积分

children.name: service_phone
children.desc: 客服电话最大字符：20

children.name: sync_weixin_mode
children.desc: 微信卡包的同步设置范围选择：0-3，0:不同步；1:基于卡号核销；2:基于卡号和条形码核销；3:基于卡号和二维码核销

children.name: term_days
children.desc: 生效持续天数(term_type为3时必传)

children.name: term_end_time
children.desc: 生效结束时间，如："2017-03-08 00:00:00"(term_type为2时必传)

children.name: term_start_time
children.desc: 生效开始时间，如："2017-03-07 00:00:00"(term_type为2时必传)

children.name: term_to_card_alias
children.desc: 失效后，默认转变的会员卡，默认不转变

children.name: term_type
children.desc: 生效方式类型，1:从领取开始无期限；2:从固定时刻开始，到固定时刻结束；3:从领取开始，持续一段时长(termDays)

requestDemos.code:
'{"card_alias":"Y365c84hdmi0qn","name":"Open55","color_code":"#cf3e36","description":"更新描述","service_phone":"10010","activate_mode":1,"sync_weixin_mode":1,"rights":[{"type":1,"is_available":true}],"term_days":365,"term_type":3}', ]; $my_files = [ ]; echo '
';
var_dump(
    $client->post($method, $api_version, $my_params, $my_files)
);
echo '
';

token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['card_update']="{"card_alias":"Y365c84hdmi0qn","name":"Open55","color_code":"#cf3e36","description":"更新描述","service_phone":"10010","activate_mode":1,"sync_weixin_mode":1,"rights":[{"type":1,"is_available":true}],"term_days":365,"term_type":3}"

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.scrm.card.update', '3.0.0', 'GET', params=params, files=files)

name: update
scenarios: 更新会员卡，此接口需申请高级权限方可调用。仅支持免签名通讯协议(AccessToken)调用,不支持签名通讯协议(AppId/AppSecret)调用。
